reviews.text: This is a nice hotel that is situated close to the university. The front desk staff were pleasant and helpful. The rooms were ok, typical European hotel rooms. Our room had a sketch drawing on the wall which added to the room's decor. The bathroom was sparse as are the amenities in the room. Basically, its just a bed, tv, dresser/wardrobe. The included breakfast buffet was served in a British themed pub located in the same building as the hotel (the hotel has a couple of the top floors in a commercial building). The buffet's selection was sparse. All in all though, this hotel has an ok value for someone that needs to stay for the nigh enroute. I wouldn't recommend it for an overnight stay or people looking for a romantic getaway.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, Well Staffed and Good Location
